topic.title: AWS Marketplace
topic.shortdesc: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a collection of web services that make up a cloud-computing platform.

body.p: The recommended and often easiest way to get started is to use the Couchbase Server Amazon Machine Images (AMIs).

AMIs provides the information required to launch an instance of a virtual server in the cloud and are available within the AWS Marketplace. In this guide, command line examples that begin with $ are run in a standard Linux shell.
